idea:
The electrical power network in India is a complicated system that comprises different equipment like electrical machines and transformers. An outage of any of these equipment hampers the economic and social life. Due to severe competition and restructuring taking place in the power industry, there is a need to reduce maintenance costs, operate transformers as much as possible, extend their life, and prevent unplanned outages. Hence, in recent years monitoring and diagnostics of these equipment have become essential. 


One can imagine the total number of Distribution and Power Transformers in India. If at least 2% of these transformers fail it leads to huge expenditure for utilities. Monitoring such essential equipment of the power sector remotely is a challenging task. The solution lies in IoT based remote monitoring of these systems. We are a group with experience in research fields related to Transformers, Electromagnetics, Optimization & control, and IoT. We have got a strong ground hold with one of us being in this field and these all made us come together as a group to provide enhanced solutions.
name: Finemen Diagnostics and Instruments
